mapper.select: SELECT id id, seller_id sellerId, account_bank accountBank, account account, account_name accountName, account_phone accountPhone FROM seller_bank_account WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seller_bank_account ( seller_id, account_bank, account, account_name, account_phone, id ) VALUES ( #{sellerId}, #{accountBank}, #{account}, #{accountName}, #{accountPhone}, #{id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE seller_bank_account SET seller_id = #{sellerId} , account_bank = #{accountBank} , account = #{account} , account_name = #{accountName} , account_phone = #{accountPhone} , id = #{id} WHERE id = #{id}
